item.text: Then the whole group of them rose up and brought Jesus before Pilate.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="2723" class="">accuse</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “We <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st> <st data-num="1294" class="">subverting</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st>, <st data-num="2967" class="">forbidding</st><n id="4" /> us to <st data-num="1325" class="">pay</st> the <st data-num="5411">tribute tax</st><n id="5" /> to <st data-num="2541" class="">Caesar</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">claiming</st> that he <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="7" /> a <st data-num="935" class="">king</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1510">Are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>?” <st data-num="1161" class="">He</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> so.”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st>, “I <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="159">basis for an accusation</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">against</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>.”
But they persisted in saying, “He incites the people by teaching throughout all Judea. It started in Galilee and ended up here!”
Now when Pilate heard this, he asked whether the man was a Galilean.

When<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1921" class="">learned</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod’s</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">jurisdiction</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="375" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="375" class="">over</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="846">who</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> happened to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st>.

When<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3029" class="">very</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">glad</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he had <st data-num="2425" class="">long</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">desired</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> he had <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="1679" class="">hoping</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">perform</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous sign</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> Herod<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1905" class="">questioned</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">considerable</st> <st data-num="3056">length</st>; <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="611">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st>.

The <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="2476" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="2159" class="">vehemently</st> <st data-num="2723" class="">accusing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161">Even</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4753" class="">soldiers</st> <st data-num="1848" class="">treated</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1848">with contempt</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1702" class="">mocked</st> him. Then,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4016" class="">dressing</st> him <st data-num="4016" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2986" class="">elegant</st> <st data-num="2066" class="">clothes</st>,<n id="2" /> Herod<n id="3" /> <st data-num="375" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="375" class="">back</st> to <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st>.
That very day Herod and Pilate became friends with each other, for prior to this they had been enemies.
Then Pilate called together the chief priests, the leaders, and the people,

and <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “You <st data-num="4374" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> one who was <st data-num="654" class="">misleading</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>. When <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="350" class="">examined</st> him <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st><n id="2" /> did <st data-num="3762" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="159" class="">guilty</st><n id="3" /> of anything you <st data-num="2723" class="">accused</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> of doing.

<st data-num="3761" class="">Neither</st> did <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="375" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> back <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>. <st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, he has <st data-num="4238" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="514" class="">deserving</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.<n id="2" />
I will therefore have him flogged and release him.”
But they all shouted out together, “Take this man away! Release Barabbas for us!”

(This<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="3748">man who</st> had been <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">into</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> an <st data-num="4714" class="">insurrection</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">started</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> for <st data-num="5408" class="">murder.)</st><n id="3" />

<st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> <st data-num="4377" class="">addressed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> once <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> because he <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they kept on <st data-num="2019" class="">shouting</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4717" class="">Crucify</st>, <st data-num="4717" class="">crucify</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”

A <st data-num="5154">third time</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1063">Why</st>? <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">wrong</st> has he <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st>? I have <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> guilty<n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="159">crime</st> deserving <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.<n id="2" /> I will <st data-num="3767" class="">therefore</st> <st data-num="3811" class="">flog</st><n id="3" /> him and <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they were <st data-num="1945" class="">insistent</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="154" class="">demanding</st> with <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">shouts</st> that <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> be <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">shouts</st> <st data-num="2729" class="">prevailed</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1948" class="">decided</st><n id="3" /> that <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="155" class="">demand</st> should be <st data-num="1096" class="">granted</st>.
He released the man they asked for, who had been thrown in prison for insurrection and murder. But he handed Jesus over to their will.
As they led him away, they seized Simon of Cyrene, who was coming in from the country. They placed the cross on his back and made him carry it behind Jesus.

A <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4128" class="">number</st> of the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, among them <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st><n id="1" /> who were <st data-num="2354" class="">mourning</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2875" class="">wailing</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4762" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="2364" class="">Daughters</st> of <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weep</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="4133" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weep</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">this is certain</st>:<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> are <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> when they will <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="3107">Blessed</st> are the <st data-num="4723" class="">barren</st>, the <st data-num="2836" class="">wombs</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">never</st> <st data-num="1080">bore children</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3149" class="">breasts</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">never</st> <st data-num="5142" class="">nursed!’</st><n id="2" />
Then they will begin to say to the mountains, ‘Fall on us!’ and to the hills, ‘Cover us!’
For if such things are done when the wood is green, what will happen when it is dry?”
Two other criminals were also led away to be executed with him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> that is <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> “The <st data-num="2898" class="">Skull</st>,”<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="2532">along with</st> the <st data-num="2557" class="">criminals</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="710" class="">left</st>.
[But Jesus said, “Father, forgive them, for they don’t know what they are doing.”] Then they threw dice to divide his clothes.

The <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2532">also</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> there <st data-num="2334" class="">watching</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="758">leaders</st> <st data-num="1592" class="">ridiculed</st><n id="1" /> him, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “He <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st>. Let him <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, his <st data-num="1588">chosen one</st>!”

The <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1702" class="">mocked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="4334">coming up</st> and <st data-num="4374" class="">offering</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3690">sour wine</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1487">If</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>, <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st>!”
There was also an inscription over him, “This is the king of the Jews.”
One of the criminals who was hanging there railed at him, saying, “Aren’t you the Christ? Save yourself and us!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="5346" class="">saying</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3761">Don’t</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">since</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="846">same</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">sentence</st> of <st data-num="2917" class="">condemnation</st>?<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1346" class="">rightly</st> <st data-num="3303" class="">so</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> we are <st data-num="618" class="">getting</st> what we <st data-num="514">deserve</st> for <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> we <st data-num="4238" class="">did</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st> has <st data-num="4238" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="824" class="">wrong</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2424">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="3415" class="">remember</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> you <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>.”
And Jesus said to him, “I tell you the truth, today you will be with me in paradise.”
It was now about noon, and darkness came over the whole land until three in the afternoon,

because the <st data-num="2246">sun’s</st> <st data-num="1587">light failed</st>.<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="2665" class="">curtain</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="4977" class="">torn</st> <st data-num="3319">in two</st>.
Then Jesus, calling out with a loud voice, said, “Father, into your hands I commit my spirit!” And after he said this he breathed his last.
Now when the centurion saw what had happened, he praised God and said, “Certainly this man was innocent!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> that had <st data-num="4836" class="">assembled</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2335" class="">spectacle</st>, when they <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> what had <st data-num="1096">taken place,</st> <st data-num="5290">returned</st> home <st data-num="5180" class="">beating</st> their <st data-num="4738" class="">breasts</st>.<n id="1" />
And all those who knew Jesus stood at a distance, and the women who had followed him from Galilee saw these things.
Now there was a man named Joseph who was a member of the council, a good and righteous man.

(<st data-num="3778">He</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510">had</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4784" class="">consented</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1012" class="">plan</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4234" class="">action.)</st> He<n id="3" /> was <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Judean</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="707" class="">Arimathea</st>, and was <st data-num="4327">looking forward</st> to<n id="5" /> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="3778" class="">He</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">went</st> to <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> and <st data-num="154">asked for</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2507" class="">took</st> it <st data-num="2507" class="">down</st>, <st data-num="1794" class="">wrapped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> in a <st data-num="4616">linen cloth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3418" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="2991">cut out of the rock</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> no <st data-num="3762" class="">one</st> had <st data-num="3768" class="">yet</st> <st data-num="1510">been</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">buried</st>.<n id="5" />

It <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="3904" class="">preparation</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> was <st data-num="2020" class="">beginning</st>.<n id="2" />

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510">had</st> <st data-num="4905" class="">accompanied</st> Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st> <st data-num="2628" class="">followed</st>, and they <st data-num="2300" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">how</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> was <st data-num="5087" class="">laid</st> in it.

Then they returned and prepared aromatic spices and perfumes.

On the Sabbath they rested according to the commandment.
